mapper.select: SELECT u.realname,ch.datetime,c.name course,h.title FROM commit_homework ch LEFT JOIN homework h ON ch.hid=h.id LEFT JOIN user u ON ch.uid=u.id LEFT JOIN course c ON h.course=c.id ORDER BY ch.datetime desc LIMIT 0,15
select uid, hid, filepath from commit_homework where hid=#{hid} and uid=#{uid}
mapper.delete: delete from commit_homework where uid=#{uid} and hid=#{hid}
mapper.insert: insert into commit_homework(uid, hid, filepath,datetime) VALUES (#{uid},#{hid},#{filePath},#{datetime})
